Job Description: Director Rabo Corporate Investments  Direct Investments NetherlandsImagineOur Rabo Corporate Investments RCI department is part of the Global Corporate Clients business unit, within the Wholesale  Rural division of Rabobank RCI currently has circa EUR 1 billion assets under management and has the ambition to grow the asset base to EUR 22 billion in 2023 Direct Investments actively originates transactions in the Netherlands and monitors, adds value and creates cross sell to its existing portfolio of Dutch SME enterprises Being a longterm and sustainable partner for our Dutch and global FA clients we help them transform through growth and innovation with our capital solutions, leveraging on Rabobanks knowledge and network As Director, you will be responsible for originating and executing Direct Investments in the Netherlands ranging from straight equity to subordinated debt A responsibility with impact, which you shape with high energy, work ethic, and desire for excellent execution and team workCollaboration is at the heart of everything we do With you as Director and part of the Rabo Corporate Investments RCI department with 30 colleagues in the Netherlands, you will cooperate with diverse colleagues in a variety of roles The team has a hands on approach, focussing on extending our network and cooperating with various teams outside RCIBeing able to work in a complex and matrix environment with a strong market  customer focus and having a strong personality are clearly essential for the role of Director As a senior within Rabobank you take responsibility, facilitate and inspire other team members, you actively seek for in and external collaboration with stakeholders and you make the difference for the community Proactively goes the extra mile, and demonstrates good communication skills In addition, its important that you recognise everything in the checklist belowYoull already be aware that Rabobank is a financial services provider for more than 85 million customers in 40 countries But did you know that we aim to contribute to real change with our Growing a better world together mission As an equity investor, we leverage and monetise Rabobanks comprehensive, broad and deep expertise and network to support the success of such relevant companies Hence, being an added value partner beyond bringing along capitalDo you want to become the best version of yourself We would love to help you achieve this by continuously focusing on your growth, development and investing in an environment where you keep learning every day We create an environment to innovate and initiate This way, we offer you numerous opportunities to grow, exceed your expectations and to do the right thing exceptionally well In addition, you can also expect on the basis of a 40 hour working weekAre you the person were looking for Are you ready to join Rabobankour team as Director and make a difference to yourself, our customers and to society We look forward to receiving your application for this vacancy in Utrecht
